title: CURVE, LAB EMERALD AND DIAMOND GOLD NECKLACE
description: Featuring 12 lab-grown emeralds and a single diamond set in a graduating shape, the Curve Necklace is a quintessential choice for everyday wear and layering.
details:
Metal: 18K gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver

Setting: 3-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown emerald and diamond
Stone Shape: Round cut

Closure: Spring ring


Lab-Grown Emerald Carat: 


1.2 CTW DEW 


Lab-Grown Diamond Carat, Color and Quality: 

Stone Color: E/F
Stone Clarity: VS1
0.1 CTW 

What is Lab-Grown?
